Texts.Eng:
Subterranean dwelling, Antlion-like mining warrior species that live in ashlands and deserts. They are strong and fairly heat resistant.
    
 Diet: Omnivore
  
 ^orange;Perks^reset;:
 +^green;10^reset;% Health 
 +^green;5^reset;% Protection
 Resist: ^green;25^reset;% Fire

 Immune: Burning, Sandstorms, Quicksand, Jungle Dirt and Silt
 
 ^orange;Environment^reset;:
 On ^green;Desert, Red Desert, Volcanic Primeval and Volcanic^reset; biomes you move +^green;10^reset;% faster on the ground.
  
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:
 Broadsword +^green;20^reset;% Crit Damage, 
 Hammer +^10^reset;% Protection  +^green;20^reset;% Knockback Resistance
 Drill: +^green;10^reset;% Damage, +^green;10^reset;% Energy
    
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
 Weak: -^red;25^reset;% Ice Resistance
